about_the_game:
The Story

Embark on an exciting adventure with Naoto, an ordinary Japanese schoolboy whose life is turned upside down after the betrayal of his two best friends. Transported to a mysterious other world, Naoto embarks on an unforgettable journey full of challenges, discoveries, and new opportunities.

Your decisions determine the path of the protagonist - each choice can change the course of the plot, affecting the development of events and interaction with the characters. A visual novel with an anime style and Live2D animated characters will immerse you in an atmosphere of tension, sadness, and a sense of adventure.

Evolve with Naoto, overcoming both psychological and physical challenges to uncover the depths of this unique world. The game is suitable for fans of anime and visual novels who appreciate deep plots and the ability to influence the fate of the characters.

Characters

Fuko is a mysterious girl who suddenly appeared in the protagonist's life. Who is she really - a friend or an enemy? Will Naoto be able to reveal her true nature?

Umina is a talented alchemist whose acquaintance with the protagonist will bring new challenges. What is more important to her - success or feelings? Perhaps even she doesn't know this yet.

The maid who loves to flirt with the protagonist and create spicy situations. But is this her true identity? Perhaps, somewhere deep in her soul, Naoto will discover another Kara?

Strong and belligerent, Olivia is a true example of a female knight who stands guard over law and order. But what is she really like? Does Olivia really value only strength?

Main features of the game:

- RenPy as the game engine.

- Fully animated Live2D characters.

- Animated backgrounds.

- More than 50 story images.

- Your choice affects the plot.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Dual-Core 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible with DirectX 9.0c

short_description: Koregafuko is a fantasy visual novel. Immerse yourself in a new world together with an ordinary Japanese schoolboy Naoto and discover all its secrets!
